name: King of Plumber
description:
The most classical mining casual game
COMPLETELY FREE，All kinds of trending props are waiting for you， Collect all the treasures that have been dug into the bag.
Click on screen to move your fingers left and right，and maybe can find the most mysterious creatures of the world.

【game feature】
Dozens of props are waiting you
Simple gameplay，endless fun
Continuously improve your mining skill
Super gorgeous game effects and exquisite game interface.
Newly gameplay，give player different experience，come and join fishing plan！
